title: Solid, liquid, gas
brief_description: All materials, both living and nonliving, are matter. This video introduces students to the three forms of matter - solid, liquid and gas. Many common examples of each are given, as well as simple, effective demonstrations which help to describe their basic properties. Suitable for Mid-Upper Primary level students. Teachers guide included.
